Talk_0006:

Talk_0008:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>The survey team discovered stone slabs
in each of the <clr:0000>Ring Ruins <clr:ffff>sites here. They
found this one in the <clr:0000>ruin above us<clr:ffff>.
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_00>Our leader is able to read Zonai writing
and says the text on this slab is a record
of a historic fight.
One that was between a great king of
that era...and the Demon King.

The ruler did not, or could not, defeat
the Demon King and instead imprisoned
that mighty foe.
The text also says...<sp:5:1:0>that the sages who
fought beside this ruler <clr:0000>left something
behind<clr:ffff> in case the Demon King returned.
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>It worries me to know this discovery talks
about a Demon King's return...<sp:5:1:0>and here
the Upheaval has just happened.
If only we knew what those sages did to
prepare<clr:0000> in case he came back<clr:ffff>.

<sp:3:0:2:0701>Ah,<sp:5:0:0> sorry. I didn't mean to think and fret
at the same time there.

You can read the <clr:0000>deciphered writing<clr:ffff> for
yourself. It's all right next to the slab.
Talk_0030:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Ease_00>*sigh*...<sp:5:1:0> At any rate, I hope he'll get off
of the <clr:0000>stone slab<clr:ffff> soon.
Talk_0009:
<sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:SurpriseS>Huh, the inn owner is...him! That
guy there!

He came to change our beds, but then I
realized he'd fallen sound asleep.

Nothing wakes him up! I tried shouting.
And then shaking him. Nothing!

<sp:3:0:2:0a00>What's more, he decided to doze off on
top of this priceless <clr:0000>stone slab<clr:ffff>.
Talk_0031:
<sp:3:0:2:0500>It looks like he's having a dream about
<clr:0000>hearty truffles<clr:ffff>.

Maybe he'd open his eyes if he <clr:0000>smelled<clr:ffff>
a truffle in front of his nose.

<sp:3:0:2:0c00>But hearty truffles are fairly rare and
hard to find.<sp:5:1:0>

I found one...once.
Near_0002: I won't take my eyes off it!
Talk_0022:
<sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Think>Hang on... If I slept on a stone slab, would I dream
about the glory days of the Zonai?

<clr:0000>Saguru <clr:ffff>never comes down, so maybe I'll give it
a try...<sp:0:2:2:6400>

<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Painful_01>Ah, yes. Stone slabs are, well, slabs.

He won't wake up even if I shake him or
shout. This is really bad!
